price: 天地的军队，只是安拉的。安拉是万能的，是至睿的。
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
